name: Sophia Lin
persona: Sophia Lin is a dedicated 21-year-old Biochemistry major who consistently strives for academic excellence, as reflected in her near-perfect CGPA. She is highly organized, motivated by ambitious grade goals, and maintains disciplined study habits. Sophia approaches challenges with perseverance and confidence, rarely succumbing to test anxiety. Her strong sense of self-efficacy helps her tackle demanding coursework and research projects. Sophia is known among her peers for her reliability and passion for science.
